snippet: Van Heusen, the 91-year-old clothing brand, is using football as a way to get young men interested in style.
abstract: Andrew Adam Newman Advertising Column notes clothier Van Heusen is rolling out a broad marketing campaign that uses football as a way to get young men interested in style; statistics show that only 29 percent of men 18 and older express an interest in keeping up with fashion trends.
lead_paragraph: Van Heusen, the 91-year-old clothing brand, is using football as a way to get young men interested in style.

headline.main: A Formerly Button-Down Brand Loosens Up
